scripts.build:minimal: npm --prefix server install --production=false && cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate && npm --prefix client install --production=false && npm --prefix client run build
scripts.setup: npm install && npm --prefix client install && npm --prefix server install
scripts.db:migrate:dev: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.pre-deploy: npm run safety-check && echo 'Safety check passed - ready for deployment'
